item.description:
Hey guys, due to a business trip I will not be able to attend this month's FPA meeting. I'd like to meet up though to get the Open House planning kicked off.

 

This coming Monday is a holiday for me, I decided just to throw the date out there to see if it works for anyone else.

 

Other dates that work for me are Saturday February 23, Sunday February 24 or possibly February 21 (Thursday) any time after 6 p.m.

 

Hopefully Mr. Valera will be kind enough to let us use the FCA....

 

Please text/call me at 617-671-4248 if you'd like to help out but can't attend a planning session or send me an email at dawnmarinelli@hotmail.com

 

The tentative date approved by Matt for this event will be the first weekend of June 2013. Sunday 6/2/13

 

What we will need:

Volunteers for set up (day before and early the morning of the event)

Volunteers for the actual event (whole day not needed, let me know if you can attend for part of the day)

Idea's for different booths

Members to contact prior attendees for availability

Airplanes! Let me know if yours is available for show that day

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Open House Planning Meeting
